bio: Lekor, a Breton mage skilled in illusion, seeks knowledge and power beyond societal expectations. Growing up in the magical city of Farrun, I faced persecution for my arcane abilities. The personal challenge of overcoming prejudice and escaping the narrow confines of my homeland ignited my passion for adventure. My motivation is to unravel the mysteries of magic and illusion, leaving a mark that transcends the limitations placed upon me.
name: Lekor
